title: Apple avoids watch ban, Google warns of layoffs
text: Apple (AAPL) will remove the blood oxygen feature on some of its watches to avoid a US government ban on selling the devices. The issue stems from a patent dispute with Masimo (MASI) over the technology. Google (GOOG, GOOGL) is warning of more job cuts this year. In a memo to employees, CEO Sundar Pichai warned that cuts may be necessary for the company to reach 'ambitious goals' this year. In Europe, Yahoo Finance is live from the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland. We will speak with several big names today including Blackstone Group (BX) CEO Steve Schwarzman, Grayscale (GBTC) CEO Michael Sonnenshein, and Qualcomm (QCOM) CEO Cristiano Amon.
